plot: Screenwriter Dave always dreamed of being one of the heroes he writes about, especially the ones that get the girls at the end of the picture.
title: The Typewriter
plot_es: Screenwriter Dave always dreamed of being one of the heroes he writes about, especially the ones that get the girls at the end of the picture.
plot_en: Screenwriter Dave always dreamed of being one of the heroes he writes about, especially the ones that get the girls at the end of the picture.
